2497    public float singleFoam(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w) {
2498        final float p0 = x;
2499        final float p1 = x * -0.25f + y *  0.9682458365518543f;
2500        final float p2 = x * -0.25f + y * -0.3227486121839514f + z *  0.91287092917527690f;
2501        final float p3 = x * -0.25f + y * -0.3227486121839514f + z * -0.45643546458763834f + w *  0.7905694150420949f;
2502        final float p4 = x * -0.25f + y * -0.3227486121839514f + z * -0.45643546458763834f + w * -0.7905694150420947f;
2503
2504        float xin = p1;
2505        float yin = p2;
2506        float zin = p3;
2507        float win = p4;
2508        final float a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win);
2509        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
2510        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
2511        xin = p0;
2512        yin = p2;
2513        zin = p3;
2514        win = p4;
2515        final float b = valueNoise(seed, xin + a, yin, zin, win);
2516        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
2517        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
2518        xin = p0;
2519        yin = p1;
2520        zin = p3;
2521        win = p4;
2522        final float c = valueNoise(seed, xin + b, yin, zin, win);
2523        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
2524        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
2525        xin = p0;
2526        yin = p1;
2527        zin = p2;
2528        win = p4;
2529        final float d = valueNoise(seed, xin + c, yin, zin, win);
2530        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
2531        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
2532        xin = p0;
2533        yin = p1;
2534        zin = p2;
2535        win = p3;
2536        final float e = valueNoise(seed, xin + d, yin, zin, win);
2537
2538        float result = (a + b + c + d + e) * 0.2f;
2539        if(result <= 0.5f){
2540            result *= 2;
2541            result *= result;
2542            return result * result - 1;
2543        }
2544        else{
2545            result = (result - 1) * 2;
2546            result *= result;
2547            return 1 - result * result;
2548        }
2549    }
2550    public float getFoamFractal(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
2551        x *= frequency;
2552        y *= frequency;
2553        z *= frequency;
2554        w *= frequency;
2555        u *= frequency;
2556
2557        switch (fractalType) {
2558            case FBM:
2559                return singleFoamFractalFBM(x, y, z, w, u);
2560            case BILLOW:
2561                return singleFoamFractalBillow(x, y, z, w, u);
2562            case RIDGED_MULTI:
2563                return singleFoamFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z, w, u);
2564            default:
2565                return 0;
2566        }
2567    }

2569    private float singleFoamFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
2570        final int seed = this.seed;
2571        float sum = singleFoam(seed, x, y, z, w, u);
2572        float amp = 1;
2573
2574        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
2575            x *= lacunarity;
2576            y *= lacunarity;
2577            z *= lacunarity;
2578            w *= lacunarity;
2579            u *= lacunarity;
2580
2581            amp *= gain;
2582            sum += singleFoam(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u) * amp;
2583        }
2584
2585        return sum * fractalBounding;
2586    }

2588    private float singleFoamFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
2589        final int seed = this.seed;
2590        float sum = Math.abs(singleFoam(seed, x, y, z, w, u)) * 2 - 1;
2591        float amp = 1;
2592
2593        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
2594            x *= lacunarity;
2595            y *= lacunarity;
2596            z *= lacunarity;
2597            w *= lacunarity;
2598            u *= lacunarity;
2599
2600            amp *= gain;
2601            sum += (Math.abs(singleFoam(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
2602        }
2603
2604        return sum * fractalBounding;
2605    }

2607    private float singleFoamFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
2608        final int seed = this.seed;
2609        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike;
2610        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
2611            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleFoam(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u));
2612            spike *= spike * amp;
2613            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
2614            sum += (spike * ampBias);
2615            ampBias *= 2f;
2616            x *= lacunarity;
2617            y *= lacunarity;
2618            z *= lacunarity;
2619            w *= lacunarity;
2620            u *= lacunarity;
2621        }
2622        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
2623    }

2629    public float singleFoam(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
2630        final float p0 = x *  0.8157559148337911f + y *  0.5797766823136037f;
2631        final float p1 = x * -0.7314923478726791f + y *  0.6832997137249108f;

2633        final float p3 = x * -0.0208603044412437f + y * -0.3155296974329846f + z * -0.316227766016838f + w *   0.8944271909999159f;
2634        final float p4 = x * -0.0208603044412437f + y * -0.3155296974329846f + z * -0.316227766016838f + w * -0.44721359549995804f + u *  0.7745966692414833f;
2635        final float p5 = x * -0.0208603044412437f + y * -0.3155296974329846f + z * -0.316227766016838f + w * -0.44721359549995804f + u * -0.7745966692414836f;
2636
2637        float xin = p1;
2638        float yin = p2;
2639        float zin = p3;
2640        float win = p4;
2641        float uin = p5;
2642        final float a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin);
2643        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
2644        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
2645        xin = p0;
2646        yin = p2;
2647        zin = p3;
2648        win = p4;
2649        uin = p5;
2650        final float b = valueNoise(seed, xin + a, yin, zin, win, uin);
2651        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
2652        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
2653        xin = p0;
2654        yin = p1;
2655        zin = p3;
2656        win = p4;
2657        uin = p5;
2658        final float c = valueNoise(seed, xin + b, yin, zin, win, uin);
2659        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
2660        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
2661        xin = p0;
2662        yin = p1;
2663        zin = p2;
2664        win = p4;
2665        uin = p5;
2666        final float d = valueNoise(seed, xin + c, yin, zin, win, uin);
2667        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
2668        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
2669        xin = p0;
2670        yin = p1;
2671        zin = p2;
2672        win = p3;
2673        uin = p5;
2674        final float e = valueNoise(seed, xin + d, yin, zin, win, uin);
2675        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
2676        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
2677        xin = p0;
2678        yin = p1;
2679        zin = p2;
2680        win = p3;
2681        uin = p4;
2682        final float f = valueNoise(seed, xin + e, yin, zin, win, uin);
2683
2684        float result = (a + b + c + d + e + f) * 0.16666666666666666f;
2685        if(result <= 0.5f){
2686            result *= 2;
2687            return result * result * result * result * result - 1;
2688        }
2689        else {
2690            result = (result - 1) * 2;
2691            return result * result * result * result * result + 1;
2692        }
2693    }

2718        float amp = 1;
2719
2720        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {

2723            z *= lacunarity;
2724            w *= lacunarity;
2725            u *= lacunarity;
2726            v *= lacunarity;
2727
2728            amp *= gain;

2881
2882        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
2883            x *= lacunarity;
2884            y *= lacunarity;
2885
2886            amp *= gain;
2887            sum += singlePerlin(++seed, x, y) * amp;
2888        }
2889

2899            x *= lacunarity;
2900            y *= lacunarity;
2901
2902            amp *= gain;

2909    private float singlePerlinFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y) {
2910        int seed = this.seed;

2912        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
2913            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singlePerlin(seed + i, x, y));
2914            spike *= spike * amp;
2915            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
2916            sum += (spike * ampBias);
2917            ampBias *= 2f;
2918            x *= lacunarity;
2919            y *= lacunarity;
2920        }
2921        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;

2928    private float singlePerlin(int seed, float x, float y) {
2929        int x0 = fastFloor(x);
2930        int y0 = fastFloor(y);
2931        int x1 = x0 + 1;
2932        int y1 = y0 + 1;
2933
2934        float xs, ys;
2935        switch (interpolation) {
2936            default:
2937            case LINEAR:
2938                xs = x - x0;
2939                ys = y - y0;
2940                break;
2941            case HERMITE:
2942                xs = hermiteInterpolator(x - x0);
2943                ys = hermiteInterpolator(y - y0);
2944                break;
2945            case QUINTIC:
2946                xs = quinticInterpolator(x - x0);
2947                ys = quinticInterpolator(y - y0);
2948                break;
2949        }
2950
2951        float xd0 = x - x0;
2952        float yd0 = y - y0;
2953        float xd1 = xd0 - 1;
2954        float yd1 = yd0 - 1;
2955
2956        float xf0 = lerp(gradCoord2D(seed, x0, y0, xd0, yd0), gradCoord2D(seed, x1, y0, xd1, yd0), xs);
2957        float xf1 = lerp(gradCoord2D(seed, x0, y1, xd0, yd1), gradCoord2D(seed, x1, y1, xd1, yd1), xs);
2958
2959        return lerp(xf0, xf1, ys);
2960    }

3033    private float singlePerlin(int seed, float x, float y, float z) {
3034        int x0 = fastFloor(x);
3035        int y0 = fastFloor(y);
3036        int z0 = fastFloor(z);
3037        int x1 = x0 + 1;
3038        int y1 = y0 + 1;
3039        int z1 = z0 + 1;
3040
3041        float xs, ys, zs;
3042        switch (interpolation) {
3043            default:
3044            case LINEAR:
3045                xs = x - x0;
3046                ys = y - y0;
3047                zs = z - z0;
3048                break;
3049            case HERMITE:
3050                xs = hermiteInterpolator(x - x0);
3051                ys = hermiteInterpolator(y - y0);
3052                zs = hermiteInterpolator(z - z0);
3053                break;
3054            case QUINTIC:
3055                xs = quinticInterpolator(x - x0);
3056                ys = quinticInterpolator(y - y0);
3057                zs = quinticInterpolator(z - z0);
3058                break;
3059        }
3060
3061        final float xd0 = x - x0;
3062        final float yd0 = y - y0;
3063        final float zd0 = z - z0;
3064        final float xd1 = xd0 - 1;
3065        final float yd1 = yd0 - 1;
3066        final float zd1 = zd0 - 1;
3067
3068        final float xf00 = lerp(gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z0, xd0, yd0, zd0), gradCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z0, xd1, yd0, zd0), xs);
3069        final float xf10 = lerp(gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z0, xd0, yd1, zd0), gradCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z0, xd1, yd1, zd0), xs);
3070        final float xf01 = lerp(gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z1, xd0, yd0, zd1), gradCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z1, xd1, yd0, zd1), xs);
3071        final float xf11 = lerp(gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z1, xd0, yd1, zd1), gradCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z1, xd1, yd1, zd1), xs);
3072
3073        final float yf0 = lerp(xf00, xf10, ys);
3074        final float yf1 = lerp(xf01, xf11, ys);
3075
3076        return lerp(yf0, yf1, zs);

3084        int y0 = fastFloor(y);
3085        int z0 = fastFloor(z);

3089        int z1 = z0 + 1;
3090        int w1 = w0 + 1;
3091

3094            default:

3097                ys = y - y0;
3098                zs = z - z0;
3099                ws = w - w0;

3111                ws = quinticInterpolator(w - w0);
3112                break;

3142    private float singlePerlinFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
3143        int seed = this.seed;
3144        float sum = singlePerlin(seed, x, y, z, w);
3145        float amp = 1;
3146
3147        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3148            x *= lacunarity;
3149            y *= lacunarity;
3150            z *= lacunarity;
3151            w *= lacunarity;
3152
3153            amp *= gain;
3154            sum += singlePerlin(++seed, x, y, z, w) * amp;
3155        }
3156
3157        return sum * fractalBounding;
3158    }
3159
3160    private float singlePerlinFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
3161        int seed = this.seed;
3162        float sum = Math.abs(singlePerlin(seed, x, y, z, w)) * 2 - 1;
3163        float amp = 1;
3164
3165        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3166            x *= lacunarity;
3167            y *= lacunarity;
3168            z *= lacunarity;
3169            w *= lacunarity;
3170
3171            amp *= gain;
3172            sum += (Math.abs(singlePerlin(++seed, x, y, z, w)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
3173        }
3174
3175        return sum * fractalBounding;
3176    }
3177
3178    private float singlePerlinFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
3179        int seed = this.seed;
3180        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike;
3181        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
3182            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singlePerlin(seed + i, x, y,  z, w));
3183            spike *= spike * amp;
3184            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
3185            sum += (spike * ampBias);
3186            ampBias *= 2f;
3187            x *= lacunarity;
3188            y *= lacunarity;
3189            z *= lacunarity;
3190            w *= lacunarity;
3191        }
3192        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
3193    }

3196        return singlePerlin(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency, u * frequency);
3197    }

3500    private float singlePerlinFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
3501        int seed = this.seed;
3502        float sum = singlePerlin(seed, x, y, z, w, u, v);
3503        float amp = 1;
3504
3505        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3506            x *= lacunarity;
3507            y *= lacunarity;
3508            z *= lacunarity;
3509            w *= lacunarity;
3510            u *= lacunarity;
3511            v *= lacunarity;
3512
3513            amp *= gain;
3514            sum += singlePerlin(++seed, x, y, z, w, u, v) * amp;
3515        }
3516
3517        return sum * fractalBounding;
3518    }
3519
3520    private float singlePerlinFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
3521        int seed = this.seed;
3522        float sum = Math.abs(singlePerlin(seed, x, y, z, w, u, v)) * 2 - 1;
3523        float amp = 1;
3524
3525        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3526            x *= lacunarity;
3527            y *= lacunarity;
3528            z *= lacunarity;
3529            w *= lacunarity;
3530            u *= lacunarity;
3531            v *= lacunarity;
3532
3533            amp *= gain;
3534            sum += (Math.abs(singlePerlin(++seed, x, y, z, w, u, v)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
3535        }
3536
3537        return sum * fractalBounding;
3538    }
3539
3540    private float singlePerlinFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
3541        int seed = this.seed;
3542        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike;
3543        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
3544            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singlePerlin(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u, v));
3545            spike *= spike * amp;
3546            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
3547            sum += (spike * ampBias);
3548            ampBias *= 2f;
3549            x *= lacunarity;
3550            y *= lacunarity;
3551            z *= lacunarity;
3552            w *= lacunarity;
3553            u *= lacunarity;
3554            v *= lacunarity;
3555        }
3556        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
3557    }

3559    // Simplex Noise
3560    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y, float z) {
3561        x *= frequency;
3562        y *= frequency;
3563        z *= frequency;
3564
3565        switch (fractalType) {
3566            case FBM:
3567                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z);
3568            case BILLOW:
3569                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y, z);
3570            case RIDGED_MULTI:
3571                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z);
3572            default:
3573                return 0;
3574        }
3575    }

3577    /**
3578     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
3579     * (2) and gain (0.5) in 3D.
3580     * @param x
3581     * @param y
3582     * @param z
3583     * @param seed
3584     * @param octaves
3585     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3586     */
3587    public float layered3D(float x, float y, float z, int seed, int octaves)
3588    {
3589        x *= 0.03125f;
3590        y *= 0.03125f;
3591        z *= 0.03125f;
3592
3593        float sum = 1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z));
3594        float amp = 1;
3595
3596        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3597            x *= 2f;
3598            y *= 2f;
3599            z *= 2f;
3600
3601            amp *= 0.5f;
3602            sum -= (1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z))) * amp;
3603        }
3604        amp = gain;
3605        float ampFractal = 1;
3606        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3607            ampFractal += amp;
3608            amp *= gain;
3609        }
3610        return sum / ampFractal;
3611    }
3612    /**
3613     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
3614     * (2) and gain (0.5) in 3D.
3615     * @param x
3616     * @param y
3617     * @param z
3618     * @param seed
3619     * @param octaves
3620     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3621     */
3622    public float layered3D(float x, float y, float z, int seed, int octaves, float frequency)
3623    {
3624        x *= frequency;
3625        y *= frequency;
3626        z *= frequency;
3627
3628        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z);
3629        float amp = 1;
3630
3631        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3632            x *= 2f;
3633            y *= 2f;
3634            z *= 2f;
3635
3636            amp *= 0.5f;
3637            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z) * amp;
3638        }
3639        amp = gain;
3640        float ampFractal = 1;
3641        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3642            ampFractal += amp;
3643            amp *= gain;
3644        }
3645        return sum / ampFractal;
3646    }

3708            x *= lacunarity;
3709            y *= lacunarity;

3718            ampFractal += amp;

3758    /**
3759     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
3760     * (2) and gain (0.5).
3761     * @param x
3762     * @param y

3771    }
3772    /**
3773     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves, specified frequency, and the default
3774     * lacunarity (2) and gain (0.5).
3775     * @param x
3776     * @param y
3777     * @param z
3778     * @param seed
3779     * @param octaves
3780     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3781     */
3782    public float ridged3D(float x, float y, float z, int seed, int octaves, float frequency)
3783    {
3784        return ridged3D(x, y, z, seed, octaves, frequency, 2f);
3785    }
3786    /**
3787     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and specified lacunarity (the amount of
3788     * frequency change between octaves); gain is not used.
3789     * @param x
3790     * @param y
3791     * @param z
3792     * @param seed any int
3793     * @param octaves how many "layers of detail" to generate; at least 1, but note this slows down with many octaves
3794     * @param frequency often about {@code 1f / 32f}, but generally adjusted for the use case
3795     * @param lacunarity when {@code octaves} is 2 or more, this affects the change between layers
3796     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3797     */
3798    public float ridged3D(float x, float y, float z, int seed, int octaves, float frequency, float lacunarity)
3799    {
3800        x *= frequency;
3801        y *= frequency;
3802        z *= frequency;
3803
3804        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike;
3805        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
3806            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z));
3807            spike *= spike * amp;
3808            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
3809            sum += (spike * ampBias);
3810            ampBias *= 2f;
3811            x *= lacunarity;
3812            y *= lacunarity;
3813            z *= lacunarity;
3814        }
3815        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
3816    }
3817
3818    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z) {
3819        int seed = this.seed;
3820        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike;
3821        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
3822            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z));
3823            spike *= spike * amp;
3824            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
3825            sum += (spike * ampBias);
3826            ampBias *= 2f;
3827            x *= lacunarity;
3828            y *= lacunarity;
3829            z *= lacunarity;
3830        }
3831        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
3832    }
3833
3834    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z) {
3835        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency);
3836    }
3837
3838    private final static float F3 = (1f / 3f);
3839    private final static float G3 = (1f / 6f);
3840    private final static float G33 = -0.5f;
3841
3842    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z) {
3843        float t = (x + y + z) * F3;
3844        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
3845        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
3846        int k = fastFloor(z + t);
3847
3848        t = (i + j + k) * G3;
3849        float x0 = x - (i - t);
3850        float y0 = y - (j - t);
3851        float z0 = z - (k - t);
3852
3853        int i1, j1, k1;
3854        int i2, j2, k2;
3855
3856        if (x0 >= y0) {
3857            if (y0 >= z0) {
3858                i1 = 1;
3859                j1 = 0;
3860                k1 = 0;
3861                i2 = 1;
3862                j2 = 1;
3863                k2 = 0;
3864            } else if (x0 >= z0) {
3865                i1 = 1;
3866                j1 = 0;
3867                k1 = 0;
3868                i2 = 1;
3869                j2 = 0;
3870                k2 = 1;
3871            } else // x0 < z0
3872            {
3873                i1 = 0;
3874                j1 = 0;
3875                k1 = 1;
3876                i2 = 1;
3877                j2 = 0;
3878                k2 = 1;
3879            }
3880        } else // x0 < y0
3881        {
3882            if (y0 < z0) {
3883                i1 = 0;
3884                j1 = 0;
3885                k1 = 1;
3886                i2 = 0;
3887                j2 = 1;
3888                k2 = 1;
3889            } else if (x0 < z0) {
3890                i1 = 0;
3891                j1 = 1;
3892                k1 = 0;
3893                i2 = 0;
3894                j2 = 1;
3895                k2 = 1;
3896            } else // x0 >= z0
3897            {
3898                i1 = 0;
3899                j1 = 1;
3900                k1 = 0;
3901                i2 = 1;
3902                j2 = 1;
3903                k2 = 0;
3904            }
3905        }
3906
3907        float x1 = x0 - i1 + G3;
3908        float y1 = y0 - j1 + G3;
3909        float z1 = z0 - k1 + G3;
3910        float x2 = x0 - i2 + F3;
3911        float y2 = y0 - j2 + F3;
3912        float z2 = z0 - k2 + F3;
3913        float x3 = x0 + G33;
3914        float y3 = y0 + G33;
3915        float z3 = z0 + G33;
3916
3917        float n = 0;
3918
3919        t = 0.6f - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0 - z0 * z0;
3920        if (t > 0) {
3921            t *= t;
3922            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i, j, k, x0, y0, z0);
3923        }
3924
3925        t = 0.6f - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1 - z1 * z1;
3926        if (t > 0) {
3927            t *= t;
3928            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, k + k1, x1, y1, z1);
3929        }
3930
3931        t = 0.6f - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2 - z2 * z2;
3932        if (t > 0) {
3933            t *= t;
3934            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i + i2, j + j2, k + k2, x2, y2, z2);
3935        }
3936
3937        t = 0.6f - x3 * x3 - y3 * y3 - z3 * z3;
3938        if (t > 0)  {
3939            t *= t;
3940            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, k + 1, x3, y3, z3);
3941        }
3942
3943        return 31.5f * n;
3944    }
3945
3946    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y) {
3947        x *= frequency;
3948        y *= frequency;
3949
3950        switch (fractalType) {
3951            case FBM:
3952                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y);
3953            case BILLOW:
3954                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y);
3955            case RIDGED_MULTI:
3956                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y);
3957            default:
3958                return 0;
3959        }
3960    }

3962    /**
3963     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
3964     * (2) and gain (0.5) in 2D.
3965     * @param x
3966     * @param y
3967     * @param seed
3968     * @param octaves
3969     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3970     */
3971    public float layered2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves)
3972    {
3973        x *= 0.03125f;
3974        y *= 0.03125f;
3975
3976        float sum = 1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y));
3977        float amp = 1;
3978
3979        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3980            x *= 2f;
3981            y *= 2f;
3982
3983            amp *= 0.5f;
3984            sum -= (1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y))) * amp;
3985        }
3986        amp = gain;
3987        float ampFractal = 1;
3988        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3989            ampFractal += amp;
3990            amp *= gain;
3991        }
3992        return sum / ampFractal;
3993    }
3994    /**
3995     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
3996     * (2) and gain (0.5) in 2D.

3998     * @param y
3999     * @param seed
4000     * @param octaves
4001     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4002     */
4003    public float layered2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves, float frequency)

4006        y *= frequency;

4008        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y);
4009        float amp = 1;
4010
4011        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4012            x *= 2f;
4013            y *= 2f;
4014
4015            amp *= 0.5f;
4016            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y) * amp;
4017        }
4018        amp = gain;
4019        float ampFractal = 1;
4020        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4021            ampFractal += amp;
4022            amp *= gain;
4023        }

4077            x *= lacunarity;
4078            y *= lacunarity;
4079

4081            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y) * amp;
4082        }
4083        amp = gain;

4092    private float singleSimplexFractalFBM(float x, float y) {
4093        int seed = this.seed;
4094        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y);
4095        float amp = 1;
4096
4097        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4098            x *= lacunarity;
4099            y *= lacunarity;
4100
4101            amp *= gain;
4102            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y) * amp;
4103        }
4104
4105        return sum * fractalBounding;
4106    }

4108    private float singleSimplexFractalBillow(float x, float y) {
4109        int seed = this.seed;
4110        float sum = Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1;
4111        float amp = 1;
4112
4113        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4114            x *= lacunarity;
4115            y *= lacunarity;
4116
4117            amp *= gain;
4118            sum += (Math.abs(singleSimplex(++seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4119        }
4120
4121        return sum * fractalBounding;
4122    }

4124    /**
4125     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
4126     * (2) and gain (0.5).
4127     * @param x
4128     * @param y
4129     * @param seed

4131     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4132     */
4133    public float ridged2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves)
4134    {
4135        return ridged2D(x, y, seed, octaves, 0.03125f, 2f);
4136    }
4137    /**
4138     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
4139     * (2) and gain (0.5).
4140     * @param x
4141     * @param y
4142     * @param seed
4143     * @param octaves
4144     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4145     */
4146    public float ridged2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves, float frequency)
4147    {
4148        return ridged2D(x, y, seed, octaves, frequency, 2f);
4149    }
4150    /**
4151     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and specified lacunarity (the amount of
4152     * frequency change between octaves); gain is not used.
4153     * @param x
4154     * @param y
4155     * @param seed any int
4156     * @param octaves how many "layers of detail" to generate; at least 1, but note this slows down with many octaves
4157     * @param frequency often about {@code 1f / 32f}, but generally adjusted for the use case
4158     * @param lacunarity when {@code octaves} is 2 or more, this affects the change between layers
4159     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4160     */
4161    public float ridged2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves, float frequency, float lacunarity)
4162    {
4163        x *= frequency;
4164        y *= frequency;
4165
4166        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike;
4167        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4168            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y));
4169            spike *= spike * amp;
4170            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
4171            sum += (spike * ampBias);
4172            ampBias *= 2f;
4173            x *= lacunarity;
4174            y *= lacunarity;
4175        }
4176        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
4177    }
4178
4179    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y) {
4180        int seed = this.seed;
4181        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike;
4182        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4183            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y));
4184            spike *= spike * amp;
4185            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
4186            sum += (spike * ampBias);
4187            ampBias *= 2f;
4188            x *= lacunarity;
4189            y *= lacunarity;
4190        }
4191        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
4192    }

4194    public float getSimplex(float x, float y) {
4195        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency);
4196    }
4197
4198    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y) {
4199        float t = (x + y) * F2f;
4200        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4201        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4202
4203        t = (i + j) * G2f;
4204        float X0 = i - t;
4205        float Y0 = j - t;
4206
4207        float x0 = x - X0;
4208        float y0 = y - Y0;
4209
4210        int i1, j1;
4211        if (x0 > y0) {
4212            i1 = 1;
4213            j1 = 0;
4214        } else {
4215            i1 = 0;
4216            j1 = 1;
4217        }
4218
4219        float x1 = x0 - i1 + G2f;
4220        float y1 = y0 - j1 + G2f;
4221        float x2 = x0 - 1 + H2f;
4222        float y2 = y0 - 1 + H2f;
4223
4224        float n = 0f;
4225
4226        t = 0.75f - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0;
4227        if (t >= 0) {
4228            t *= t;
4229            n += t * t * gradCoord2D(seed, i, j, x0, y0);
4230        }
4231
4232        t = 0.75f - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1;
4233        if (t > 0) {
4234            t *= t;
4235            n += t * t * gradCoord2D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, x1, y1);
4236        }
4237
4238        t = 0.75f - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2;
4239        if (t > 0)  {
4240            t *= t;
4241            n += t * t * gradCoord2D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, x2, y2);
4242        }
4243
4244        return 9.11f * n;
4245    }
4246
4247    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4248        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency);
4249    }
4250
4251    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4252        float n = 0f;
4253        float t = (x + y + z + w) * F4f;
4254        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4255        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4256        int k = fastFloor(z + t);
4257        int l = fastFloor(w + t);
4258        t = (i + j + k + l) * G4f;
4259        final float X0 = i - t;
4260        final float Y0 = j - t;
4261        final float Z0 = k - t;
4262        final float W0 = l - t;
4263        final float x0 = x - X0;
4264        final float y0 = y - Y0;
4265        final float z0 = z - Z0;
4266        final float w0 = w - W0;
4267
4268        final int[] SIMPLEX_4D = FastNoise.SIMPLEX_4D;
4269        final int c = (x0 > y0 ? 128 : 0) | (x0 > z0 ? 64 : 0) | (y0 > z0 ? 32 : 0) | (x0 > w0 ? 16 : 0) | (y0 > w0 ? 8 : 0) | (z0 > w0 ? 4 : 0);
4270        final int ip = SIMPLEX_4D[c];
4271        final int jp = SIMPLEX_4D[c + 1];
4272        final int kp = SIMPLEX_4D[c + 2];
4273        final int lp = SIMPLEX_4D[c + 3];
4274
4275        final int i1 = ip >> 2;
4276        final int i2 = ip >> 1 & 1;
4277        final int i3 = ip & 1;
4278        final int j1 = jp >> 2;
4279        final int j2 = jp >> 1 & 1;
4280        final int j3 = jp & 1;
4281        final int k1 = kp >> 2;
4282        final int k2 = kp >> 1 & 1;
4283        final int k3 = kp & 1;
4284        final int l1 = lp >> 2;
4285        final int l2 = lp >> 1 & 1;
4286        final int l3 = lp & 1;
4287
4288        final float x1 = x0 - i1 + G4f;
4289        final float y1 = y0 - j1 + G4f;
4290        final float z1 = z0 - k1 + G4f;
4291        final float w1 = w0 - l1 + G4f;
4292        final float x2 = x0 - i2 + 2 * G4f;
4293        final float y2 = y0 - j2 + 2 * G4f;
4294        final float z2 = z0 - k2 + 2 * G4f;
4295        final float w2 = w0 - l2 + 2 * G4f;
4296        final float x3 = x0 - i3 + 3 * G4f;
4297        final float y3 = y0 - j3 + 3 * G4f;
4298        final float z3 = z0 - k3 + 3 * G4f;
4299        final float w3 = w0 - l3 + 3 * G4f;
4300        final float x4 = x0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4301        final float y4 = y0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4302        final float z4 = z0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4303        final float w4 = w0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4304
4305        t = 0.75f - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0 - z0 * z0 - w0 * w0;
4306        if (t > 0) {
4307            t *= t;
4308            n = t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i, j, k, l, x0, y0, z0, w0);
4309        }
4310        t = 0.75f - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1 - z1 * z1 - w1 * w1;
4311        if (t > 0) {
4312            t *= t;
4313            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, k + k1, l + l1, x1, y1, z1, w1);
4314        }
4315        t = 0.75f - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2 - z2 * z2 - w2 * w2;
4316        if (t > 0) {
4317            t *= t;
4318            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + i2, j + j2, k + k2, l + l2, x2, y2, z2, w2);
4319        }
4320        t = 0.75f - x3 * x3 - y3 * y3 - z3 * z3 - w3 * w3;
4321        if (t > 0) {
4322            t *= t;
4323            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + i3, j + j3, k + k3, l + l3, x3, y3, z3, w3);
4324        }
4325        t = 0.75f - x4 * x4 - y4 * y4 - z4 * z4 - w4 * w4;
4326        if (t > 0) {
4327            t *= t;
4328            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, k + 1, l + 1, x4, y4, z4, w4);
4329        }
4330
4331        return 4.9f * n;
4332    }

4334    // Simplex Noise
4335    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4336        x *= frequency;
4337        y *= frequency;
4338        z *= frequency;
4339        w *= frequency;
4340
4341        switch (fractalType) {
4342            case FBM:
4343                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z, w);
4344            case BILLOW:
4345                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y, z, w);
4346            case RIDGED_MULTI:
4347                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z, w);
4348            default:
4349                return 0;
4350        }
4351    }
4352
4353    private float singleSimplexFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4354        int seed = this.seed;
4355        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w);
4356        float amp = 1;
4357
4358        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4359            x *= lacunarity;
4360            y *= lacunarity;
4361            z *= lacunarity;
4362            w *= lacunarity;
4363
4364            amp *= gain;
4365            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w) * amp;
4366        }
4367
4368        return sum * fractalBounding;
4369    }
4370    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4371        int seed = this.seed;
4372        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike;
4373        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4374            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w));
4375            spike *= spike * amp;
4376            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
4377            sum += (spike * ampBias);
4378            ampBias *= 2f;
4379            x *= lacunarity;
4380            y *= lacunarity;
4381            z *= lacunarity;
4382            w *= lacunarity;
4383        }
4384        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
4385    }
4386
4387    private float singleSimplexFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4388        int seed = this.seed;
4389        float sum = Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w)) * 2 - 1;
4390        float amp = 1;
4391
4392        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4393            x *= lacunarity;
4394            y *= lacunarity;
4395            z *= lacunarity;
4396            w *= lacunarity;
4397
4398            amp *= gain;
4399            sum += (Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4400        }
4401
4402        return sum * fractalBounding;
4403    }
4404    
4405    // 5D Simplex
4406
4407    private static final float
4408            F5 = (float) ((Math.sqrt(6.0) - 1.0) / 5.0),
4409            G5 = (float) ((6.0 - Math.sqrt(6.0)) / 30.0),
4410            LIMIT5 = 0.7f;
4411
4412    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4413        float n0, n1, n2, n3, n4, n5;
4414        float t = (x + y + z + w + u) * F5;
4415        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4416        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4417        int k = fastFloor(z + t);
4418        int l = fastFloor(w + t);
4419        int h = fastFloor(u + t);
4420        t = (i + j + k + l + h) * G5;
4421        float X0 = i - t;
4422        float Y0 = j - t;
4423        float Z0 = k - t;
4424        float W0 = l - t;
4425        float U0 = h - t;
4426        float x0 = x - X0;
4427        float y0 = y - Y0;
4428        float z0 = z - Z0;
4429        float w0 = w - W0;
4430        float u0 = u - U0;
4431
4432        int rankx = 0;
4433        int ranky = 0;
4434        int rankz = 0;
4435        int rankw = 0;
4436        int ranku = 0;
4437
4438        if (x0 > y0) rankx++; else ranky++;
4439        if (x0 > z0) rankx++; else rankz++;
4440        if (x0 > w0) rankx++; else rankw++;
4441        if (x0 > u0) rankx++; else ranku++;
4442
4443        if (y0 > z0) ranky++; else rankz++;
4444        if (y0 > w0) ranky++; else rankw++;
4445        if (y0 > u0) ranky++; else ranku++;
4446
4447        if (z0 > w0) rankz++; else rankw++;
4448        if (z0 > u0) rankz++; else ranku++;
4449
4450        if (w0 > u0) rankw++; else ranku++;
4451
4452        int i1 = 3 - rankx >>> 31;
4453        int j1 = 3 - ranky >>> 31;
4454        int k1 = 3 - rankz >>> 31;
4455        int l1 = 3 - rankw >>> 31;
4456        int h1 = 3 - ranku >>> 31;
4457
4458        int i2 = 2 - rankx >>> 31;
4459        int j2 = 2 - ranky >>> 31;
4460        int k2 = 2 - rankz >>> 31;
4461        int l2 = 2 - rankw >>> 31;
4462        int h2 = 2 - ranku >>> 31;
4463
4464        int i3 = 1 - rankx >>> 31;
4465        int j3 = 1 - ranky >>> 31;
4466        int k3 = 1 - rankz >>> 31;
4467        int l3 = 1 - rankw >>> 31;
4468        int h3 = 1 - ranku >>> 31;
4469
4470        int i4 = -rankx >>> 31;
4471        int j4 = -ranky >>> 31;
4472        int k4 = -rankz >>> 31;
4473        int l4 = -rankw >>> 31;
4474        int h4 = -ranku >>> 31;
4475
4476        float x1 = x0 - i1 + G5;
4477        float y1 = y0 - j1 + G5;
4478        float z1 = z0 - k1 + G5;
4479        float w1 = w0 - l1 + G5;
4480        float u1 = u0 - h1 + G5;
4481
4482        float x2 = x0 - i2 + 2 * G5;
4483        float y2 = y0 - j2 + 2 * G5;
4484        float z2 = z0 - k2 + 2 * G5;
4485        float w2 = w0 - l2 + 2 * G5;
4486        float u2 = u0 - h2 + 2 * G5;
4487
4488        float x3 = x0 - i3 + 3 * G5;
4489        float y3 = y0 - j3 + 3 * G5;
4490        float z3 = z0 - k3 + 3 * G5;
4491        float w3 = w0 - l3 + 3 * G5;
4492        float u3 = u0 - h3 + 3 * G5;
4493
4494        float x4 = x0 - i4 + 4 * G5;
4495        float y4 = y0 - j4 + 4 * G5;
4496        float z4 = z0 - k4 + 4 * G5;
4497        float w4 = w0 - l4 + 4 * G5;
4498        float u4 = u0 - h4 + 4 * G5;
4499
4500        float x5 = x0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4501        float y5 = y0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4502        float z5 = z0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4503        float w5 = w0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4504        float u5 = u0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4505
4506        t = LIMIT5 - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0 - z0 * z0 - w0 * w0 - u0 * u0;
4507        if (t < 0) n0 = 0;
4508        else
4509        {
4510            t *= t;
4511            n0 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i, j, k, l, h, x0, y0, z0, w0, u0);
4512        }
4513
4514        t = LIMIT5 - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1 - z1 * z1 - w1 * w1 - u1 * u1;
4515        if (t < 0) n1 = 0;
4516        else
4517        {
4518            t *= t;
4519            n1 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, k + k1, l + l1, h + h1, x1, y1, z1, w1, u1);
4520        }
4521
4522        t = LIMIT5 - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2 - z2 * z2 - w2 * w2 - u2 * u2;
4523        if (t < 0) n2 = 0;
4524        else
4525        {
4526            t *= t;
4527            n2 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i2, j + j2, k + k2, l + l2, h + h2, x2, y2, z2, w2, u2);
4528        }
4529
4530        t = LIMIT5 - x3 * x3 - y3 * y3 - z3 * z3 - w3 * w3 - u3 * u3;
4531        if (t < 0) n3 = 0;
4532        else
4533        {
4534            t *= t;
4535            n3 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i3, j + j3, k + k3, l + l3, h + h3, x3, y3, z3, w3, u3);
4536        }
4537
4538        t = LIMIT5 - x4 * x4 - y4 * y4 - z4 * z4 - w4 * w4 - u4 * u4;
4539        if (t < 0) n4 = 0;
4540        else
4541        {
4542            t *= t;
4543            n4 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i4, j + j4, k + k4, l + l4, h + h4, x4, y4, z4, w4, u4);
4544        }
4545
4546        t = LIMIT5 - x5 * x5 - y5 * y5 - z5 * z5 - w5 * w5 - u5 * u5;
4547        if (t < 0) n5 = 0;
4548        else
4549        {
4550            t *= t;
4551            n5 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, k + 1, l + 1, h + 1, x5, y5, z5, w5, u5);
4552        }
4553
4554        return  (n0 + n1 + n2 + n3 + n4 + n5) * 10f; 
4555    }
4556
4557    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4558        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency, u * frequency);
4559    }
4560    // Simplex Noise
4561    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4562        x *= frequency;
4563        y *= frequency;
4564        z *= frequency;
4565        w *= frequency;
4566        u *= frequency;
4567
4568        switch (fractalType) {
4569            case FBM:
4570                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z, w, u);
4571            case BILLOW:
4572                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y, z, w, u);
4573            case RIDGED_MULTI:
4574                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z, w, u);
4575            default:
4576                return 0;
4577        }
4578    }
4579
4580    private float singleSimplexFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4581        int seed = this.seed;
4582        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w, u);
4583        float amp = 1;
4584
4585        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4586            x *= lacunarity;
4587            y *= lacunarity;
4588            z *= lacunarity;
4589            w *= lacunarity;
4590            u *= lacunarity;
4591
4592            amp *= gain;
4593            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u) * amp;
4594        }
4595
4596        return sum * fractalBounding;
4597    }
4598    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4599        int seed = this.seed;
4600        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike;
4601        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4602            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u));
4603            spike *= spike * amp;
4604            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
4605            sum += (spike * ampBias);
4606            ampBias *= 2f;
4607            x *= lacunarity;
4608            y *= lacunarity;
4609            z *= lacunarity;
4610            w *= lacunarity;
4611            u *= lacunarity;
4612        }
4613        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
4614    }
4615
4616    private float singleSimplexFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4617        int seed = this.seed;
4618        float sum = Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w, u)) * 2 - 1;
4619        float amp = 1;
4620
4621        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4622            x *= lacunarity;
4623            y *= lacunarity;
4624            z *= lacunarity;
4625            w *= lacunarity;
4626            u *= lacunarity;
4627
4628            amp *= gain;
4629            sum += (Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4630        }
4631
4632        return sum * fractalBounding;
4633    }
4634
4635
4636    // 6D Simplex
4637
4638    private final transient float[] m = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0}, cellDist = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
4639    private final transient int[] distOrder = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0}, intLoc = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
4640
4641    private static final float
4642            F6 = (float) ((Math.sqrt(7.0) - 1.0) / 6.0),
4643            G6 = F6 / (1f + 6f * F6),
4644            LIMIT6 = 0.8375f;
4645
4646
4647    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
4648        final float s = (x + y + z + w + u + v) * F6;
4649
4650        final int skewX = fastFloor(x + s), skewY = fastFloor(y + s), skewZ = fastFloor(z + s),
4651                skewW = fastFloor(w + s), skewU = fastFloor(u + s), skewV = fastFloor(v + s);
4652        intLoc[0] = skewX;
4653        intLoc[1] = skewY;
4654        intLoc[2] = skewZ;
4655        intLoc[3] = skewW;
4656        intLoc[4] = skewU;
4657        intLoc[5] = skewV;
4658
4659        final float unskew = (skewX + skewY + skewZ + skewW + skewU + skewV) * G6;
4660        cellDist[0] = x - skewX + unskew;
4661        cellDist[1] = y - skewY + unskew;
4662        cellDist[2] = z - skewZ + unskew;
4663        cellDist[3] = w - skewW + unskew;
4664        cellDist[4] = u - skewU + unskew;
4665        cellDist[5] = v - skewV + unskew;
4666
4667        int o0 = (cellDist[0]<cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4668        int o1 = (cellDist[1]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4669        int o2 = (cellDist[2]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<=cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4670        int o3 = (cellDist[3]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<=cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<=cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4671        int o4 = (cellDist[4]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<=cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<=cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<=cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4672        int o5 = 15-(o0+o1+o2+o3+o4);
4673
4674        distOrder[o0]=0;
4675        distOrder[o1]=1;
4676        distOrder[o2]=2;
4677        distOrder[o3]=3;
4678        distOrder[o4]=4;
4679        distOrder[o5]=5;
4680
4681        float n = 0;
4682        float skewOffset = 0;
4683
4684        for (int c = -1; c < 6; c++) {
4685            if (c != -1) intLoc[distOrder[c]]++;
4686
4687            m[0] = cellDist[0] - (intLoc[0] - skewX) + skewOffset;
4688            m[1] = cellDist[1] - (intLoc[1] - skewY) + skewOffset;
4689            m[2] = cellDist[2] - (intLoc[2] - skewZ) + skewOffset;
4690            m[3] = cellDist[3] - (intLoc[3] - skewW) + skewOffset;
4691            m[4] = cellDist[4] - (intLoc[4] - skewU) + skewOffset;
4692            m[5] = cellDist[5] - (intLoc[5] - skewV) + skewOffset;
4693
4694            float tc = LIMIT6;
4695
4696            for (int d = 0; d < 6; d++) {
4697                tc -= m[d] * m[d];
4698            }
4699
4700            if (tc > 0) { 
4701                tc *= tc;
4702                n += gradCoord6D(seed, intLoc[0], intLoc[1], intLoc[2], intLoc[3], intLoc[4], intLoc[5],
4703                        m[0], m[1], m[2], m[3], m[4], m[5]) * tc * tc;
4704            }
4705            skewOffset += G6;
4706        }
4707        return 8.1f * n;
4708
4709    }
4710
4711    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
4712        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency, u * frequency, v * frequency);
4713    }

4720        u *= frequency;
4721        v *= frequency;
4722
4723        switch (fractalType) {
4724            case FBM:
4725                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z, w, u, v);

4728            case RIDGED_MULTI:

4730            default:

4732        }

4738        float amp = 1;
4739
4740        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4741            x *= lacunarity;
4742            y *= lacunarity;
4743            z *= lacunarity;
4744            w *= lacunarity;
4745            u *= lacunarity;
4746            v *= lacunarity;
4747
4748            amp *= gain;
4749            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u, v) * amp;
4750        }
4751
4752        return sum * fractalBounding;
4753    }
4754    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {

4759            spike *= spike * amp;
4760            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));

4811    private float singleCubicFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z) {
4812        int seed = this.seed;

4814        float amp = 1;
4815        int i = 0;
4816
4817        while (++i < octaves) {
4818            x *= lacunarity;
4819            y *= lacunarity;
4820            z *= lacunarity;
4821
4822            amp *= gain;
4823            sum += singleCubic(++seed, x, y, z) * amp;
4824        }
4825
4826        return sum * fractalBounding;
4827    }

4833        int i = 0;
4834
4835        while (++i < octaves) {
4836            x *= lacunarity;
4837            y *= lacunarity;
4838            z *= lacunarity;
4839
4840            amp *= gain;
4841            sum += (Math.abs(singleCubic(++seed, x, y, z)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4842        }
4843
4844        return sum * fractalBounding;
4845    }

4847    private float singleCubicFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z) {

4851            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleCubic(seed + i, x, y, z));
4852            spike *= spike * amp;
4853            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
4854            sum += (spike * ampBias);
4855            ampBias *= 2f;
4856            x *= lacunarity;

4866
4867    private final static float CUBIC_3D_BOUNDING = 1 / (float) (1.5 * 1.5 * 1.5);
4868
4869    private float singleCubic(int seed, float x, float y, float z) {
4870        int x1 = fastFloor(x);
4871        int y1 = fastFloor(y);
4872        int z1 = fastFloor(z);
4873
4874        int x0 = x1 - 1;
4875        int y0 = y1 - 1;
4876        int z0 = z1 - 1;
4877        int x2 = x1 + 1;
4878        int y2 = y1 + 1;
4879        int z2 = z1 + 1;
4880        int x3 = x1 + 2;
4881        int y3 = y1 + 2;
4882        int z3 = z1 + 2;
4883
4884        float xs = x - (float) x1;
4885        float ys = y - (float) y1;
4886        float zs = z - (float) z1;
4887
4888        return cubicLerp(
4889                cubicLerp(
4890                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z0), xs),
4891                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z0), xs),
4892                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y2, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y2, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y2, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y2, z0), xs),
4893                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y3, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y3, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y3, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y3, z0), xs),
4894                        ys),
4895                cubicLerp(
4896                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z1), xs),
4897                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z1), xs),
4898                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y2, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y2, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y2, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y2, z1), xs),
4899                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y3, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y3, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y3, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y3, z1), xs),
4900                        ys),
4901                cubicLerp(
4902                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z2), xs),
4903                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z2), xs),
4904                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y2, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y2, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y2, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y2, z2), xs),
4905                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y3, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y3, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y3, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y3, z2), xs),
4906                        ys),
4907                cubicLerp(
4908                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z3), xs),
4909                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z3), xs),
4910                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y2, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y2, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y2, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y2, z3), xs),
4911                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y3, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y3, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y3, z3), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y3, z3), xs),
4912                        ys),
4913                zs) * CUBIC_3D_BOUNDING;
4914    }
4915

4917    public float getCubicFractal(float x, float y) {
4918        x *= frequency;
4919        y *= frequency;
4920
4921        switch (fractalType) {
4922            case FBM:
4923                return singleCubicFractalFBM(x, y);
4924            case BILLOW:
4925                return singleCubicFractalBillow(x, y);
4926            case RIDGED_MULTI:
4927                return singleCubicFractalRidgedMulti(x, y);
4928            default:
4929                return 0;
4930        }
4931    }
4932
4933    private float singleCubicFractalFBM(float x, float y) {
4934        int seed = this.seed;
4935        float sum = singleCubic(seed, x, y);
4936        float amp = 1;
4937        int i = 0;
4938
4939        while (++i < octaves) {
4940            x *= lacunarity;
4941            y *= lacunarity;
4942
4943            amp *= gain;
4944            sum += singleCubic(++seed, x, y) * amp;
4945        }
4946
4947        return sum * fractalBounding;
4948    }
4949
4950    private float singleCubicFractalBillow(float x, float y) {
4951        int seed = this.seed;
4952        float sum = Math.abs(singleCubic(seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1;
4953        float amp = 1;
4954        int i = 0;
4955
4956        while (++i < octaves) {
4957            x *= lacunarity;
4958            y *= lacunarity;
4959
4960            amp *= gain;
4961            sum += (Math.abs(singleCubic(++seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4962        }
4963
4964        return sum * fractalBounding;
4965    }
4966
4967    private float singleCubicFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y) {
4968        int seed = this.seed;
4969        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike;
4970        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4971            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleCubic(seed + i, x, y));
4972            spike *= spike * amp;
4973            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
4974            sum += (spike * ampBias);
4975            ampBias *= 2f;
4976            x *= lacunarity;
4977            y *= lacunarity;
4978        }
4979        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
4980    }
4981
4982    public float getCubic(float x, float y) {
4983        x *= frequency;
4984        y *= frequency;
4985
4986        return singleCubic(0, x, y);
4987    }
4988
4989    private final static float CUBIC_2D_BOUNDING = 1 / 2.25f;
4990
4991    private float singleCubic(int seed, float x, float y) {
4992        int x1 = fastFloor(x);
4993        int y1 = fastFloor(y);
4994
4995        int x0 = x1 - 1;
4996        int y0 = y1 - 1;
4997        int x2 = x1 + 1;
4998        int y2 = y1 + 1;
4999        int x3 = x1 + 2;
5000        int y3 = y1 + 2;
5001
5002        float xs = x - (float) x1;
5003        float ys = y - (float) y1;
5004
5005        return cubicLerp(
5006                cubicLerp(valCoord2D(seed, x0, y0), valCoord2D(seed, x1, y0), valCoord2D(seed, x2, y0), valCoord2D(seed, x3, y0),
5007                        xs),
5008                cubicLerp(valCoord2D(seed, x0, y1), valCoord2D(seed, x1, y1), valCoord2D(seed, x2, y1), valCoord2D(seed, x3, y1),
5009                        xs),
5010                cubicLerp(valCoord2D(seed, x0, y2), valCoord2D(seed, x1, y2), valCoord2D(seed, x2, y2), valCoord2D(seed, x3, y2),
5011                        xs),
5012                cubicLerp(valCoord2D(seed, x0, y3), valCoord2D(seed, x1, y3), valCoord2D(seed, x2, y3), valCoord2D(seed, x3, y3),
5013                        xs),
5014                ys) * CUBIC_2D_BOUNDING;
5015    }

5018    public float getCellular(float x, float y, float z) {
5019        x *= frequency;
5020        y *= frequency;
5021        z *= frequency;
5022
5023        switch (cellularReturnType) {
5024            case CELL_VALUE:
5025            case NOISE_LOOKUP:
5026            case DISTANCE:
5027                return singleCellular(x, y, z);
5028            default:
5029                return singleCellular2Edge(x, y, z);
5030        }
5031    }

5033    private float singleCellular(float x, float y, float z) {
5034        int xr = fastRound(x);
5035        int yr = fastRound(y);
5036        int zr = fastRound(z);
5037
5038        float distance = 999999;
5039        int xc = 0, yc = 0, zc = 0;
5040
5041        switch (cellularDistanceFunction) {
5042            case EUCLIDEAN:
5043                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5044                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5045                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5046                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5047
5048                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5049                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5050                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5051
5052                            float newDistance = vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ;
5053
5054                            if (newDistance < distance) {
5055                                distance = newDistance;
5056                                xc = xi;
5057                                yc = yi;
5058                                zc = zi;
5059                            }
5060                        }
5061                    }
5062                }
5063                break;
5064            case MANHATTAN:
5065                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5066                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5067                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5068                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5069
5070                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5071                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5072                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5073
5074                            float newDistance = Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ);
5075
5076                            if (newDistance < distance) {
5077                                distance = newDistance;
5078                                xc = xi;
5079                                yc = yi;
5080                                zc = zi;
5081                            }
5082                        }
5083                    }
5084                }
5085                break;
5086            case NATURAL:
5087                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5088                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5089                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5090                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5091
5092                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5093                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5094                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5095
5096                            float newDistance = (Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ)) + (vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ);
5097
5098                            if (newDistance < distance) {
5099                                distance = newDistance;
5100                                xc = xi;
5101                                yc = yi;
5102                                zc = zi;
5103                            }
5104                        }
5105                    }
5106                }
5107                break;
5108        }
5109
5110        switch (cellularReturnType) {
5111            case CELL_VALUE:
5112                return valCoord3D(0, xc, yc, zc);
5113
5114            case NOISE_LOOKUP:
5115                Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xc, yc, zc, seed)];
5116                return cellularNoiseLookup.getConfiguredNoise(xc + vec.x, yc + vec.y, zc + vec.z);
5117
5118            case DISTANCE:
5119                return distance - 1;
5120            default:
5121                return 0;
5122        }
5123    }

5125    private float singleCellular2Edge(float x, float y, float z) {
5126        int xr = fastRound(x);
5127        int yr = fastRound(y);
5128        int zr = fastRound(z);
5129
5130        float distance = 999999;
5131        float distance2 = 999999;
5132
5133        switch (cellularDistanceFunction) {
5134            case EUCLIDEAN:
5135                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5136                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5137                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5138                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5139
5140                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5141                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5142                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5143
5144                            float newDistance = vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ;
5145
5146                            distance2 = Math.max(Math.min(distance2, newDistance), distance);
5147                            distance = Math.min(distance, newDistance);
5148                        }
5149                    }
5150                }
5151                break;
5152            case MANHATTAN:
5153                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {

5155                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {

5157
5158                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5159                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5160                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5161
5162                            float newDistance = Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ);
5163
5164                            distance2 = Math.max(Math.min(distance2, newDistance), distance);
5165                            distance = Math.min(distance, newDistance);
5166                        }
5167                    }
5168                }
5169                break;
5170            case NATURAL:
5171                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5172                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5173                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5174                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5175

5177                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5178                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5179
5180                            float newDistance = (Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ)) + (vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ);
5181
5182                            distance2 = Math.max(Math.min(distance2, newDistance), distance);
5183                            distance = Math.min(distance, newDistance);
5184                        }
5185                    }
5186                }
5187                break;
5188            default:
5189                break;
5190        }
5191
5192        switch (cellularReturnType) {
5193            case DISTANCE_2:
5194                return distance2 - 1;
5195            case DISTANCE_2_ADD:
5196                return distance2 + distance - 1;
5197            case DISTANCE_2_SUB:
5198                return distance2 - distance - 1;
5199            case DISTANCE_2_MUL:

5392    private void singleGradientPerturb3(int seed, float perturbAmp, float frequency, float[] v3) {
5393        float xf = v3[0] * frequency;
5394        float yf = v3[1] * frequency;
5395        float zf = v3[2] * frequency;
5396
5397        int x0 = fastFloor(xf);
5398        int y0 = fastFloor(yf);
5399        int z0 = fastFloor(zf);
5400        int x1 = x0 + 1;
5401        int y1 = y0 + 1;
5402        int z1 = z0 + 1;
5403
5404        float xs, ys, zs;
5405        switch (interpolation) {
5406            default:
5407            case LINEAR:
5408                xs = xf - x0;
5409                ys = yf - y0;
5410                zs = zf - z0;
5411                break;
5412            case HERMITE:
5413                xs = hermiteInterpolator(xf - x0);
5414                ys = hermiteInterpolator(yf - y0);
5415                zs = hermiteInterpolator(zf - z0);
5416                break;
5417            case QUINTIC:
5418                xs = quinticInterpolator(xf - x0);
5419                ys = quinticInterpolator(yf - y0);
5420                zs = quinticInterpolator(zf - z0);
5421                break;
5422        }
5423
5424        Float3 vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y0, z0, seed)];
5425        Float3 vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y0, z0, seed)];
5426
5427        float lx0x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5428        float ly0x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5429        float lz0x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5430
5431        vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y1, z0, seed)];
5432        vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y1, z0, seed)];
5433
5434        float lx1x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5435        float ly1x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5436        float lz1x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5437
5438        float lx0y = lerp(lx0x, lx1x, ys);
5439        float ly0y = lerp(ly0x, ly1x, ys);
5440        float lz0y = lerp(lz0x, lz1x, ys);
5441
5442        vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y0, z1, seed)];
5443        vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y0, z1, seed)];
5444
5445        lx0x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5446        ly0x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5447        lz0x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5448
5449        vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y1, z1, seed)];
5450        vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y1, z1, seed)];
5451
5452        lx1x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5453        ly1x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5454        lz1x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5455
5456        v3[0] += lerp(lx0y, lerp(lx0x, lx1x, ys), zs) * perturbAmp;
5457        v3[1] += lerp(ly0y, lerp(ly0x, ly1x, ys), zs) * perturbAmp;
5458        v3[2] += lerp(lz0y, lerp(lz0x, lz1x, ys), zs) * perturbAmp;
5459    }

5485        int x1 = x0 + 1;
5486        int y1 = y0 + 1;

5489        switch (interpolation) {
5490            default:
5491            case LINEAR:
5492                xs = xf - x0;
5493                ys = yf - y0;
5494                break;
5495            case HERMITE:
5496                xs = hermiteInterpolator(xf - x0);
5497                ys = hermiteInterpolator(yf - y0);
5498                break;
5499            case QUINTIC:
5500                xs = quinticInterpolator(xf - x0);
5501                ys = quinticInterpolator(yf - y0);
5502                break;
5503        }

5541    public float getHoneyFractal(float x, float y) {
5542        x *= frequency;
5543        y *= frequency;
5544
5545        switch (fractalType) {
5546            case FBM:
5547                return singleHoneyFractalFBM(x, y);
5548            case BILLOW:
5549                return singleHoneyFractalBillow(x, y);
5550            case RIDGED_MULTI:
5551                return singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(x, y);
5552            default:
5553                return 0;
5554        }
5555    }

5557    private float singleHoneyFractalFBM(float x, float y) {
5558        int seed = this.seed;
5559        float sum = singleHoney(seed, x, y);
5560        float amp = 1, t;
5561
5562        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
5563            t = x;
5564            x = y * lacunarity;
5565            y = t * lacunarity;
5566
5567            amp *= gain;
5568            sum += singleHoney(seed + i, x, y) * amp;
5569        }
5570
5571        return sum * fractalBounding;
5572    }
5573
5574    private float singleHoneyFractalBillow(float x, float y) {
5575        int seed = this.seed;
5576        float sum = Math.abs(singleHoney(seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1;
5577        float amp = 1, t;
5578
5579        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
5580            t = x;
5581            x = y * lacunarity;
5582            y = t * lacunarity;
5583
5584            amp *= gain;
5585            sum += (Math.abs(singleHoney(++seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
5586        }
5587
5588        return sum * fractalBounding;
5589    }
5590
5591    private float singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y) {
5592        int seed = this.seed;
5593        float sum = 0, amp = 1, ampBias = 1f, spike, t;
5594        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
5595            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleHoney(seed + i, x, y));
5596            spike *= spike * amp;
5597            amp = Math.max(0f, Math.min(1f, spike * 2f));
5598            sum += (spike * ampBias);
5599            ampBias *= 2f;
5600            t = x;
5601            x = y * lacunarity;
5602            y = t * lacunarity;
5603        }
5604        return sum / ((ampBias - 1f) * 0.5f) - 1f;
5605    }

6383    /**
6384     * This gradient vector array was quasi-randomly generated after a lot of rejection sampling. Each gradient should
6385     * have a magnitude of 2.0, matching the magnitude of the center of an edge of a 5D hypercube.
6386     * This may bias slightly in some directions. The sums of the x, y, z, w, and u components of all 256 vectors are:
6387     * <br>
6388     * x: +0.52959638973427, y: +0.31401370534460, z: -0.14792091580658, w: -0.00781214643439, u: -0.58206620017072
6389     * <br>
6390     * Most of the rejected sets of 256 vectors had some component sums at 10 or more, so having all of these close to
6391     * 0.0 is good. The specific technique used here was to redistribute the x, y, z, w, and u components of 5D points
6392     * from the R5 sequence, putting them on a Gaussian distribution using {@link MathExtras#probit(double)} and then
6393     * normalizing the resulting 5D vector. Because the R5 sequence is quasi-random (it only very rarely returns clumps
6394     * of points that are close-together in both the sequence and in space), the Gaussian points were more likely to be
6395     * quasi-random as well, and far fewer point sets needed to be rejected.
6396     */
